sense.def:
Potem ko opišemo neko stanje ali dejstvo, uporabimo izraz
otherwise
, če želimo v nadaljevanju povedati, kakšen bi bil rezultat ali posledice, če ne bi bilo tako, kot je.

seg.quote: It's perfectly harmless, otherwise I wouldn't have done it.

sense.def:
Izraz
otherwise
uporabimo, ko opisujemo splošno stanje ali lastnost nečesa, pred tem pa navedemo kakšno izjemo tega stanja ali lastnosti.

seg.quote: The cement is slightly cracked but otherwise in good condition.
That was a sudden outbreak in an otherwise blameless career.

sense.def:
Otherwise
pomeni tudi na drugačen način;

seg.quote: Stiff and formal, the man was incapable of acting otherwise.
